name: Turny Murny
description:
A game which can be played with gyro (the turny murny thing). You should play it on a mobile device. We do not recommend to play on a computer (we're serious), but, yeah, it's possible if you want to waste your time.

APK Link: https://dl.dropboxusercontent.com/u/8670817/dondurgec.apk

Çağlar Şahin: Sound, Color Manager (seriously)
Utku Sipahioğlu: Programming, Design (seriously)
